short_summary: Procurement of furniture, lockers, and office furniture to Environment and Climate Change Canada in Gatineau, Quebec.
description: See below for further details.  Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) issued  as part of a supply arrangement (SA) under federal-provincial agreement for public works and the government procurement in Canada (PWGSC),
full_summary:
**Category 3 Furniture Tender**
=========================

**Announcement ID**: `cb-8672-73288397`

**Tender Status**: Expiré - Closed

**Procurement Category**: Goods (GD)

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering

**Description**
---------------

Environment and Climate Change Canada invites suppliers to submit a proposal for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to the National Capital Region (NCR) by October 31, 2023.

**Scope of Work**
----------------

The requirement includes:

* **Product Category 3 - Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets**: Office furniture (0 N Accoids)
* **Other**: Lockers, Office furniture

**Purchase Arrangement**
----------------------

This tender is part of the Government of Canada's procurement strategy for Indigenous Businesses.

**Supply Arrangement**
-------------------

This project is reserved for Indigenous Businesses as part of the federal government's supply arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C.

**Selection Criteria**
-------------------

* **Price**: Tenders will be awarded to the supplier providing the lowest price.

**Important Details**
--------------------

* **Eligible Trade Agreements**: International trade agreements are excluded from this tender.
* **Initial Response Deadline**: 2023-09-13T15:00:00

**Point of Contact**
-------------------

For more information, please contact:

Samantha Hatzinikou
samantha.hatzinikou@ec.gc.ca
(873) 500-0150

**Reference and Supplementary Documents**
------------------------------------------

Tender notice and supporting documents are available on the Canada Buys website at the following links:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8672/rfb-1_en.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8672/rfb_en.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8672/rfb-1_fr.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8672/rfb_fr.pdf
```

I made sure to include all relevant information such as acquisition strategy, UNSPSC codes, and necessary
